attributes.action: Allow UK Ancestry Visa holders to attend UK universities and pay the same as local students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Commonwealth Citizen's who have a British born Grandparent can apply for a UK Ancestry Visa that will allow them to live in the UK for 5 years. After 5 years they can apply for permanent residency. 

Although Ancestry Visa holders can live here indefinitely they can not go to University during this time without paying excessive foreign student fees and obtaining a seperate Student Visa.

Young people who have chosen to follow their roots and build a life in the UK should not have to wait 5 years to attend University and become professionally qualified to work in the UK.
